body:
'make' needs to be added as a dependency to the diffutils package.

---

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install diffutils
config.status: error: in `/home/ubuntu/diffutils-3.6':                                                            
config.status: error: Something went wrong bootstrapping makefile fragments    
    for automatic dependency tracking.  Try re-running configure with the            
    '--disable-dependency-tracking' option to at least be able to build                                                                 
    the package (albeit without support for automatic dependency tracking).                                                             
See `config.log' for more details 
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```console
$ uname -a 
Linux spack 4.15.0-43-generic #46-Ubuntu SMP Thu Dec 6 14:45:28 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS
```

### Additional information

This message happens when `make` is not installed on the machine. `sudo apt install make` fixes the error and the build succeeds.
title: Installation issue: diffutils
